sys_ui_message.key: **to resign, you should submit a written resignation letter to your direct manager as well as hr, specifying your last intended day of work based on the 4-week notice period. your manager will meet with you to discuss transition plans.**
sys_ui_message.message: **To resign, you should submit a written resignation letter to your direct manager as well as HR, specifying your last intended day of work based on the 4-week notice period. Your manager will meet with you to discuss transition plans.**
